The Ordinary has developed one of the best Hyaluronic Acid treatments for an instant hydration boost and easy absorption. Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5 has quickly become one of the brand’s most-loved products. Because it benefits all skin types, this serum is a must-have in anyone’s skincare cabinet.
brand_short_description_nonindex: For high-quality but affordable skincare packed full of potent ingredients, then look no further than The Ordinary. The Ordinary offer science-backed skincare products with no gimmicks and no marketing ploys. You'll never see vague terms like 'anti-ageing' from The Ordinary. Instead they simply show the ingredients they're using and explain the scientific benefits for the skin.

name: The Ordinary Supersize Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5 - 60ml
description:
Bigger size, best value, better for the environment.

 

Dehydrated and dry skin can feel uncomfortable and display signs of ageing earlier. Proper hydration can make a massive difference in the look and feel of your complexion. The Ordinary has developed one of the best Hyaluronic Acid treatments for an instant hydration boost and easy absorption. Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5 has quickly become one of the brand’s most-loved products. Because it benefits all skin types, this serum is a must-have in anyone’s skincare cabinet.

 

Key benefits of The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5

  • Instant hydration for skin
  • Suitable for all skin types, including oily skin, due to its easy absorption and weightless texture
  • Enriched with Vitamin B5 to boost surface hydration
  • Uses multiple molecular weights of Hyaluronic Acid for multi-depth hydration
  • Non-comedogenic formulation
  • 30ml
 

 

What is Hyaluronic Acid?


Hyaluronic Acid is a molecule that naturally occurs in the body and is known for its incredible water-retention properties. One single molecule can hold up to 1,000 times its weight in water. When applied as part of a skincare routine, Hyaluronic Acid provides instant hydration to plump and nourish the skin.

 

 


How does The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5 work?


The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5 is a water-based formula that blends three different weights of Hyaluronic Acid with a Hyaluronic Acid Crosspolymer to provide multi-depth hydration. This means the serum not only helps to hydrate the deeper layers of the skin but also locks in existing moisture and absorbs easily into the skin. This product is enriched with additional Vitamin B5, which boosts surface hydration and supports the work of the Hyaluronic Acid.

 

Who should use The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5?

Due to its lightweight texture, this Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin B5 serum can be beneficial for all skin types, even those with oily but dehydrated skin. This serum from The Ordinary suits anyone who is looking to plump their dry, dehydrated, or damaged complexion.

 


What is Vitamin B5, and how does it work with Hyaluronic Acid?


Vitamin B5, otherwise known as Pantothenic Acid, is a naturally occurring vitamin that helps to increase the surface hydration levels of the skin. It works as a natural moisturiser, allowing the skin to easily absorb moisture from the air, keeping your face soft and hydrated.

 

Vitamin B5 works extremely well at supporting the work of Hyaluronic Acid. This vitamin allows the acid to penetrate and moisturise the deeper layers of the skin, ensuring full-thickness hydration. The combination of the two ingredients makes this serum from The Ordinary one of the best moisture-boosting products available.

 

Is The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5 good for acne?


Whilst the Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid serum has not been developed specifically to treat or heal acne, it will help hydrate skin during or after a breakout.

 

Is The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5 good for scars/pigmentation?


The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5 does not treat scarring and pigmentation when used alone. However, it will support a routine to reduce scarring over time and help to plump up the skin for a healthier look and feel.

 

Is The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5 good for rosacea?


The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5 is excellent for helping to hydrate and repair rosacea-prone skin.

 

Is The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5 comedogenic?

The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5 is non-comedogenic.

 

Is The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5 good for wrinkles?


Dehydration and dryness can emphasise the look and depth of fine lines and wrinkles. By using The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, you can make your complexion look plumper and minimise the appearance of facial lines. Whilst this serum will not reverse the signs of premature ageing, it works well in conjunction with other anti-ageing products and helps to rehydrate skin as it becomes older and drier.

 

All of our products are filled/measured by weight/volume so the product is correctly filled to 30 ml. The packaging does not accurately reflect the size of the fill. However, this is intentional as some air must be allowed at the top for the product to actually close.
howToUse: Apply a few drops to face AM and PM before creams. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children.
ingredients: Aqua (Water), Sodium Hyaluronate, Pentylene Glycol, Propanediol, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Panthenol, Ahnfeltia Concinna Extract, Glycerin, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Citric Acid, Isoceteth-20, Ethoxydiglycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol.

reviews.review_detail: Great product at an affordable price! Just be aware of adding this to your skincare routine if other products you use already have HA in them.
This product I would consider one of those good serums in the market. This one makes my skin hydrated as what hyaluronics meant to do to our skin. I have combination skin and this works good for me.
Hydrating for my dry skin! I apply it at night  before bed and will wake up with smooth skin the next morning! Highly recommend
This product offers good hydration but often sits on top of my skin and takes a while to absorb. Very good in winter though!
Really solid hydration at an affordable price point. I usually wet my face with a cloth before to assist with the product penetration and hydration
This will be my second bottle, I love niacinamide! I can't explain how beautiful this made my skin look and feel. Truly a miracle in a bottle.
This stuff is great. I have incorporated this product and The Ordinary's niacinamide into my skincare routine and will never look back.

I love this stuff! I find it especially effective when I spray my face with a mist right beforehand. It's definitely a product you may not notice a difference with at first but if you stop using it, you really notice
its a amazing product makes my skin so smooth

reviews.review_title: Yes for the big boy size
reviews.review_detail: Absolutely LOVE that this comes in a big size. I feel like it’s never ending, it’s amazing. Plus the product is beautiful and adds a hydrating glow to the face

Not sure if it has made any difference to my teenage daughter's blemished forehead after three weeks of use. She uses it every day alongside other Ordinary products and says she likes how it doesn't irritate her skin.

I've been using this product for approximately 12 months and am a fan of the larger size offered by Adore because I tend to use a generous amount. I haven't tried other brands but this one keeps my skin a little more hydrated, which reduces the appearance of my lines, and is a good product for me to use in conjunction with other important ones like Vitamin C, a nourishing face cream and SPF.
I love this products and it is a larger size. Feel so hydrating after using it. Is a must item for every morning and night routine.

reviews.review_title: Great price but I wouldn’t buy again
reviews.review_detail: I so badly wanted to love this HA by The Ordinary because the price is so good however I found it to be quite sticky and it seemed to pill when I layered with other products. I normally use La Roche Posay B5 but wanted to try this as a cost effective alternative. I didn’t feel that it truly locked moisture into my skin and found myself using quite a lot of it. I have normal combination skin slightly on the dryer side thanks to former roaccutane use.

Highly recommended!

My skin concerns were pigmentations, large pores & fine lines under eyes (I am 47yo).

I’d been using:
AM  
Niacinamide + B5, Buffet, NMF + HA
PM
Niacinamide + B5, Retinol 0.5% in Squalane, Rosehip Oil (around eyes)
for several weeks and been fairly happy with the results when I added this Hyaluronic Acid + B5.

The first morning after I used this I couldn’t believe how plump yet firm and moist my skin was.
This must have been what my skin needed most.
I live in Far North Queensland. Because of the humidity, dry skin had never been my concern. But my skin is definitely loving this thing.

Now I use this twice a day, along with the items I mentioned above.

This brand is so product due to its price point but does it do its job? YES if you apply it correctly it really does do its job and helps with very dehydrated skin. Great to apply after being in the sun as well.
I have purchased this product 3 times now and the boost of hydration that i get is amazing!! Make sure to have a damp face before you use it because the product absorbs the water into your skin!

Love this product, love that it is in the larger size! I use twice a day and it leaves my skin soft and bright and its very soothing.
Easy to use with other products, this is a must-have for me and I will always re-purchase.
Love this serum, especially for the price. Leaves my skin feeling plump and fresh.
Really happy with this product, it's super affordable. But make sure you dont use it 2x a day, i was and it dried/irritated my skin. I now use it once every 2nd day and i am very happy with it.
super hydrating and great for my skin
My skin can't live without this serum. I use it after toner and just plumps up my skin. Essential to my skin routine!

reviews.review_title: A must have for your routine.
reviews.review_detail: Nothing compares to how this product leaves my skin feeling, glowy, smooth and fresh.
this is such a good price for this sort of ingredients, this has been really nice on my skin
I have my partner using all Ordinary products and he is obsessed. The price point fits him perfectly and he has seen a huge difference since starting his new routine.

reviews.review_title: Love that I don't have to repurchase it as often
reviews.review_detail: This is a staple in my skincare routine so I love that they came out with the supersize. It really helps hydrate my skin. I prefer to use it at night because it can pill under certain sunscreens that I use during the day. I have normal-oily skin so it's usually not necessary to use it in the morning and evening anyway.
I use this product everynight on my face after I cleanse and tone. It really evens out my skin tone and leaves my skin feeling hydrated.

reviews.review_title: I’m using this serum and it’s very hydrating
reviews.review_detail: I’m using this serum and it’s very hydrating, and the price is very good too
this is super good, it is very affordable for the ingredients and I really enjoy this on my skin
My go to hyaluronic serum. Have recommended this to all my friends and family.

This is a great hyaluronic acid and the price is really appealing, especially if you’re new to trying hyaluronic acid and want to give it a go. Have repurchased many times, only issue is it’s very tacky

I have oily, acne prone skin, and the first two times I tried this product, I felt like it gave me a few pimples in the first two days. At the same time, within 2 days my skin was utterly glowy and radiant. I tried again a third time and stuck with a smaller dose (1 drop, AM and PM), and after a pimple at the very start, my skin got used to it, and became very bright and well hydrated. 

I now use one drop of this AM and PM, mixed with one drop of TO Niacinamide 10% and one drop of Ascorbyl Glucoside Solution 12%,  and after 6 weeks all my skin concerns are gone! My skin has shifted from oily to well-hydrated normal,  I no longer have any breakouts, my skin looks radiant and even-toned and my acne hyperpigmentation is fading.  I went to a party last week and skipped the foundation because I was so confident with my skin! This product is a gamechanger.
very moisturising serum, great for dry skin
a go-to product for me. I know it'll hydrate my skin without feeling greasy or heavy
This is one of my go-to products. I use it often in my routine, my skin feels moisturized and hydrated after use. I love The Ordinary’s products and will continue to buy this serum religiously.

This improved my dryness dramatically. I always had issues with flakiness around my nose, that is completely gone!
The only drawback is you can go through it quite quickly if you like to apply it to your neck as well.

If you want to beat dull, dehydrated skin, buy yourself this product! TO Hyaluronic Acid was my first try of the brand and I haven't gone back. I attribute this product to my skin looking less dull over the year i've used it :)
Though i do prefer Medik8 HA, this was ALOT cheaper and still works well. Worth it.

reviews.review_title: Can’t be beaten for the price!
reviews.review_detail: This little beauty is absolutely amazing given the price point. Super easy to apply, I like to do it on damp skin to help it absorb even more. You cannot go wrong!
This is an ok product for the price, but there are certainly other options out there. Found this is to be a little tacky on the skin, which wasn’t great when putting on makeup etc.
I use this 3x a week and get amazing results. I had acne scars which are now disappearing!

This is quite a sticky serum but surprisingly it absorbs right in and leaves you feeling dewy. I have noticed modest improvements in skin hydration and love the saturated feel when I put it on so I keep coming back. Also seems to reduce redness a little bit.

I use this in the morning and it sits nice under makeup. Leaves my skin feeling hydrated and glowy. It is a bit thick and sticky but still absorbs nicely. The Marine Hyaluronics serum has a thinner more watery consistency. I like them both and I alternate between the two.

I love popping this under my moisturiser in the evnings, I feel it keeps my skin hydrated and soaks into the skin well. It doesn't leave it sticky, doens't have any frangrance and makes for a nice addition to my night time routine. The Ordinary is such great value - have repurchased multiple times.

Hydrates my skin but other hydrating products have to be layered on top of it. I have noticed that my skin has a bit of glow since I started using this product. I don't mind this considering the price.

reviews.review_title: A little sticky but works well for the price
reviews.review_detail: The consistency wasnt what i anticipated! it does absorb into my skin very quickly so i do recommend spraying a toner while applying to ensure its all over! However its super hydrating especially for my oily typed skin!

texture: a little sticky, slightly heavy when applied onto skin
absorbance level: very quickly into skin
my skin type: oily, however it hasnt really made my skin feel too oily
recommend: i apply only the evening because it does have a slightly heavier texture than niacinamide

Much like all the ordinary products I use - they do something to my skin but I can’t pin point what exactly. But all I know is when I stop using them my skin changes and when I start up again it improves. So whatever this does for me it works and I’ll never not use it

I absolutely adore this serum! I apply on to damp skin right after cleansing and it leaves my skin super hydrated and plump. Its only downfall is that it can feel slightly tacky on the skin at first but after a moisturiser, this isn't a worry anymore.

I am fairly new to the realms of skincare, but decided to get more into it after I turned 20 this year and freaked out a little about starting to look old. I got this product as part of an Ordinary bundle pack, and had to repurchase as it is really good. It goes on nicely and I feel like it has added a good amount of moisture back into my skin.

THIS IS THE BEST THING EVER. My skin has been so much more hydrated and plummet since I've used this product. It is super easy to put on and a few drops goes a long way so it lasts a long time. This is one of the most affordable hyaluronic acid product I have come across that works for my skin. You wont regret buying it.
Its an excellent product. After just 10 days there was a visible difference. Skin care is not just the preserve of females either!
I have dry skin that gets very flakey if I don't moisturise enough and this saves me from putting enormous amounts of my moisturiser on, I definitely recommend.
Super hydrating! slightly stickier than anticipated but once it is fully absorbed into the skin it leaves my skin feeling plump and hydrated!

reviews.review_title: Always come back to this serum
reviews.review_detail: I have swayed back and forth to more expensive HA serums but for the value and quality, this one is the best by far. Super size is great to share with my partner too - a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_title: Always come back to this serum
reviews.review_detail: I have swayed back and forth to more expensive HA serums but for the value and quality, this one is the best by far. Super size is great to share with my partner too - a little goes a long way.

This serum is simple and effective and very affordable. My skin is dry and sensitive, and I have had no flaking or dry patches since I started using it. Initially it feels heavy going on the skin, but once it settles my skin feels smooth and hydrated. I have had no sensitivity issues with it either, whereas other hyaluronic based serums felt tingly on application which I think may have been due to added scents or something. This once is not perfumed and I love it.

Cant go wrong with The Ordinary products. the Hyaluronic acid make my skin skin feel so plump and supple after. its not the best item for layering best to use at night and leave at least 20 mins before using the next product. its cheap and easy to use so def a winning product
The product is ok for me. It hydrated my skin a bit but not that much. The product also took a while for it to sink into my skin.
I love the hyaluronic acid by The Ordinary because it hydrates without feeling like a greasy moisturiser. The supersize is good value for money.

I was a bit nervous using something labelled as an acid but it is so light & hydrating. I haven't had any irritation from this at all. Skin looks & feels so much more hydrated & plump. One of my absolute favourites & is part of my daily ritual now.
This product has made a big difference in my skins hydration. I have very sensitive skin also and I haven't had any bad reactions to the product. I have purchased this over and over again!.

reviews.review_title: Doesn't do much for me but it's ok for the price
reviews.review_detail:
This product doesn't seem to do much for me. I'm not sure if that's because hyaluronic acid doesn't make a difference for my skin, or if it's just this particular product??? It's prone to a bit of pilling, so be careful with application.
On the upside (and which saves it from just 2 stars) is that this product is SUPER cheap. Nothing to lose, Give it a go. Hence I'm willing to give it 3 stars. But it it was a $100 bottle, I would have been mighty disappointed.
Really feel like this makes my skin plump and hydrated from the inside out. Can't really fault it. Use it every day in my routine.

It took me a little while to love this but I am about to purchase my third bottle. It needs to be applied to damp skin and will give you an instant hydration. l love the way it soaks into my skin and sits under other products

I love the ordinary range they have a variety for everyone. i have very dry skin and this works a treat! I apply daily before I apply my moisturizer and keeps my skin hydrated all day long. great consistency

This is a must-do step in my morning and evening skincare routine. I have combination skin with dry patches that are easily visible (even with make-up on :( ). This has really helped with hydration and has reduced, and in some areas REMOVED the dryness.
100% would recommend this product!
This HA is so affordable and defs live up to what it promises for hydration. My skin has never been more plump and hydrated. I got this supersize one because the small one ran out too quickly.
This does a great job at hydrating my skin best applied to damp skin. Its great value for money and I just love that it comes in this larger size. Highly recommend

reviews.review_title: Shiny, sticky feeling takes some getting used to - but good product
reviews.review_detail: I use this product twice daily with my other The Ordinary serums and moisturiser. I find that it can be a bit shiny and sticky after applying, but I usually let it sink it properly while I'm getting dressed so that I have my normal, matte skin surface to put my makeup on, so it isn't really a big deal. Some people might prefer to find a moisturiser that has hyaluronic acid in it to avoid the shiny, sticky feeling altogether, but it doesn't really bother me.

I use this serum specifically for microneedling treatments at home. It’s got good slip to help the pen glide over the skin, and is thick enough that it takes just the right amount of time to absorb while I’m doing the procedure. Some other thinner HA’s absorb too quickly and you just end up using a tone, so The Ordinary product performs better on that front. It’s fragrance free and very smoothing on my irritated skin post needling. It’s effective at plumping up the skin too. I only mark it down for leaving a sticky finish. Tackiness is a standard expectation of any HA product, but just feel there are more elegant products out there for general use. But in saying that - this is perfect for microneedling and the bigger size is a winner. Great value overall!
Great value for money anti aging miracle!! It is now my go to instead of rosehip oil. Best used on a damp face after cleansing!! Love, love LOVE!!
gorgeous packaging, absorbs super fast, and sooo hydrating
This is so gentle and hydrating that I use it everyday. It absorbs nicely and doesn't pill - I get the larger because I go through it so quickly even though a little goes a long way.
For the price, this product delivers on its promises. I find it very hydrating and when paired with the plant-derived squalane by the ordinary, my skin feels extra hydrated

My skin has been so dry and flakey, but implementing HA into my skin care routine has left it feeling moisturised, plump and fresh! Highly recommend, it absolutely saved my skin and the Supersize is such great value for money!

I have used 2 bottles of this and it is a great HA product which is absolutely worth purchasing, however I am now looking to try other hydrating products other than just a HA alone i.e. if I was to continue to buy HAs it would definitely be this product, but it just doesn't completely blow me away so I am looking for alternatives like oils etc. I used this + the Niacinamide and it gave me a glass skin look which I absolutely love.
Been using this forever and having it in the larger bottle is much more convenient for me so I don't run out. Lovely texture on the skin, plays nicely with all my other products.

Great value for money!! Great budget friendly product.
I find it does pill a little but if mixed with other serums but overall a great product.

I've tried wayyyy more expensive hyaluronic acid products, but always come back to this product! I always have a spare in my cupboard because I hate running out! I use this every morning under my moisturiser/sunscreen.
Love this product so much, my skin notices as soon as I’ve run out and skipped a few days. A holy grail for me!

Love how this makes my skin feel dewy and plump after using.
Obsessed and recommend to everyone
Great skin hydrator. I liked my 30ml bottle of HA so much that I then purchased this larger 60ml size.
makes my skin look super glowy and smooth and hydrated. big size is great because it creates less waste
happy with this very hydrating and reasonable price!

Pretty good
Only used it a few times so far and it made my skin soft and supple.

reviews.review_title: Leaves my skin plump and glowy
reviews.review_detail: This gives my skin a healthy hydrated look
Have had people raved about this product. I was first unsure about but after having used, I am absolutely converted! Really see an improvement on my skin.
I have large pores/combination skin type. This stuff is great it hydrates, absorbs well, couple small drops covers face and neck easily. This bigger size bottle lasts months too.

I use in combination with a few other serums from the ordinary and I love how it absorbs into my skin and leaves me feeling refreshed. Since introducing this into my skincare routine my skin is definitely more plump. As with all of their products it is very reasonably priced and great value for money.

ive used this everyday for over a year and my skin is very happy with it. you dont need to add too much as your skin can only absorb so much which results in pilling when you go to apply your next product. if im feeling lazy ill just apply this before going to sleep, its that essential

I remember feeling so helpless when my skin went through an oily face phase I had acne and could not control it. This serum changed my life after a few weeks my skin would glow yet not oily then after a few more weeks my acne cleared up.

This is great, helped me out in the winter period. My GF got me onto this. I then bought this value pack.
I love to mix this with my moisturiser.
Feels cooling to apply and my skin feels supple after
Glides onto the skin and helps to hydrate. Makes my skin look plump and refreshed

For a long time I blamed my lack of skin care routine on that - nothing worked. Or other times that, I will still get bad skin. Since using this product along with other “The Ordinary” products I have seen a huge improvement in my skin. I would highly recommend this product to anyone, whether your looking to start your skin care routine somewhere, or change it up. It worked wonders for me, and I hope it does for you.

For a long time I blamed my lack of skin care routine on that - nothing worked. Or other times that, I will still get bad skin. Since using this product along with other “The Ordinary” products I have seen a huge improvement in my skin. I would highly recommend this product to anyone, whether your looking to start your skin care routine somewhere, or change it up. It worked wonders for me, and I hope it does for you.
This is such great value for a hydrating product. I use this under my moisturiser and my skin looks great
Really nice for dehydrated skin. Did pill a bit when I used it with my other serums, but it really helped to apply a bit less and mist with water after to give the product some moisture to soak up.

I recently switched to The Ordinary hyaluronic acid because it was more budget friendly than the product I was previously using. I love it - my skin soaks it up! Great product for those who a budget conscious or new to skincare.

most_helpful_positive.review_detail: Great product at an affordable price! Just be aware of adding this to your skincare routine if other products you use already have HA in them.

most_helpful_critic.review_detail: This product offers good hydration but often sits on top of my skin and takes a while to absorb. Very good in winter though!
